iPadOS 19 will get major upgrades that make the iPad work more like Mac 

Apple is said to be focusing on 3 key areas:
 Productivity
 Multitasking
 App window management

iPad users have been asking for more desktop capabilities for years.

(via @markgurman)

iPadOS 19 is expected to be an overhaul that makes the iPad operate more like a Mac! 

New features are coming for multitasking, productivity, and app window management.

It will reportedly be a big focus at #WWDC25 in June.
